attributes.action: To ask the Speaker of the House of Commons to repay any unreasonable expenses claimed by him and for him to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Speaker of the House of Commons has shown no regard to the tax payers of this country and appears to have claimed large amounts of expenses during his office. He has shown no sign of apology and seems to be totally arrogant and in the circumstances he must go.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
